com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.insert: insert into USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT( USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT) values( USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT)
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.delete: delete from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY and USER_NAME = USER_NAME
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.deleteByUser: delete from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.deleteByUserAndShortCut: delete from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME and IS_SHORTCUT = IS_SHORTCUT and DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.deleteByDoccategory: delete from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.update: update USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT set DATE_VALIDITY = DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE = BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE = END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE = MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR = OPERATOR where USER_NAME = USER_NAME
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.select: select USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.selectByUser: select USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME and IS_SHORTCUT = 0
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.selectByDoccategory: select USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.updateShortCut: update USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT set IS_SHORTCUT = IS_SHORTCUT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME and DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.deleteShortCut: update USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT set IS_SHORTCUT = 0 where USER_NAME = USER_NAME
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.selectByUserAndRight: select USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME and DOC_CATEGORY = DOC_CATEGORY
com.css.app.right.UserDoccategoryRight.selectShortCutCat: select USER_NAME, DOC_CATEGORY, DATE_VALIDITY, BEGIN_DATE, END_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, OPERATOR, IS_SHORTCUT from USER_DOCCATEGORY_RIGHT where USER_NAME = USER_NAME and IS_SHORTCUT = 1
